subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: GAP, France, July 16 — With its leader, Floyd Landis, sounding relaxed and looking comfortable while he wore the yellow jersey in the Tour de France, the Phonak team had its reputation swing sharply upward. Phonak, from Switzerland, must have been doing something right, people involved with the Tour said, to be so successful before it yielded the jersey Saturday for strategic reasons.
